articles.description: To all those holiday present procrastinators out there (you know who you are): Be sure to ship that holiday gift sooner rather than later to get those presents to their destination before December 25.
articles.content:
Parcels jam a conveyor belt at the United States Postal Service sorting and processing facility in Boston.
Charles Krupa/AP
